column4: is there a guy who remembers my problem? then i changed user..there icons in kmenu bottom line appears and its fine..only then im on my default user its all messed up..how to fix it?
your settings are in the hidden directories (they start with a . ) you could delete these hidden directories and files
ls -la, nautilus has a show hidden files option. i would not delete them but move them somewhere
hmm that is strange, there should be something there, you in the right account?
